question_text:
When an unexpected
opportunity appears, what
sparks your excitement?

options.option_text:
The idea of organising a
memorable group event that
brings people together.

The chance to test personal
limits with a burst of energy
and fresh outdoor challenges.

question_text:
When you encounter
a complex problem,
your instinct is to:

options.option_text:
Break it down strategically,
analyse patterns, and find the
most efficient solution.

Roll up your sleeves and
experiment with different
hands-on approaches until
something works.

question_text:
What kind of
legacy would you like
to leave behind?

options.option_text:
A thriving natural space you
helped cultivate, promoting
health and tranquility
for future generations.

A groundbreaking piece of
art or a unique handcrafted
item that inspires awe
and bold creativity.

question_text:
When planning
something special,
you prioritise:

options.option_text:
Making sure everyone
feels included and that
the experience brings
people closer together.

Creating an engaging
challenge or activity that
gets people thinking and
participating actively.

question_text:
If you were to start
a new club, what would
its focus be?

options.option_text:
A workshop for creating
unique, handcrafted art
pieces from unconventional
or adventurous materials.

A group dedicated to exploring
local nature trails and identifying
plants, perhaps with a mapping
or strategic challenge.

question_text:
What kind of
weekend plans
would you prefer?

options.option_text:
A lively getaway with friends
focused on team-based
strategy games and fun
social challenges.

A relaxing retreat focused
on healthy cooking
workshops and learning
a new hands-on craft.

question_text:
When you have free time,
you're drawn to:

options.option_text:
Activities that get your
heart pumping and make you
feel energized and alive.

Projects where you can
experiment with new
techniques and express
your unique vision.

question_text:
What motivates you to
take on a challenge?

options.option_text:
The chance to bring people
together and make a positive
impact on your community.

The thrill of pushing creative
boundaries and discovering
new ways to express yourself.

question_text:
What kind of
community improvement
project would you lead?

options.option_text:
Setting up a regular
community game night or
a local esports tournament
for all ages.

Building a community garden
or creating handcrafted
benches and nature-inspired
planters for public spaces.

question_text:
If someone gave you a
surprise gift for fun, which
would excite you most?

options.option_text:
Something that challenges
my mind or lets me get
close to nature.

Tickets to a lively community
fair or a voucher for a
relaxing spa day.
